DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read all policies for privileged role assignments of your company's directory
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read policies for privileged role-based access control (RBAC) assignments of your company's directory, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read all policies for privileged role assignments of your company's directory
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read policies for privileged role-based access control (RBAC) assignments of your company's directory, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read, update, and delete all policies for privileged role assignments of your company's directory
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, update, and delete policies for privileged role-based access control (RBAC) assignments of your company's directory, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read, update, and delete all policies for privileged role assignments of your company's directory
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read, update, and delete policies for privileged role-based access control (RBAC) assignments of your company's directory, on your behalf.
